query.name: SELECT_DUPLICATE_STRUCTURES_RESOURCE
query.default: SELECT STR.STRUCTURE_ID, STR.PARENT_ID, RES.RESOURCE_ID, STR.RESOURCE_PATH FROM CMS_${PROJECT}_STRUCTURE STR, CMS_${PROJECT}_RESOURCES RES WHERE STR.STRUCTURE_ID = ? AND STR.RESOURCE_ID = STR.RESOURCE_ID ORDER BY STR.RESOURCE_PATH

query.name: SELECT_ALL_DUPLICATE_STRUCTURES
query.default: SELECT STR.STRUCTURE_ID, STR.PARENT_ID, STR.RESOURCE_ID, STR.RESOURCE_PATH FROM CMS_OFFLINE_STRUCTURE STR, CMS_OFFLINE_STRUCTURE STR2 WHERE STR2.RESOURCE_PATH = STR.RESOURCE_PATH GROUP BY STR.STRUCTURE_ID,STR.PARENT_ID, STR.RESOURCE_ID, STR.RESOURCE_PATH HAVING count(*)>1 ORDER BY STR.RESOURCE_PATH
